{"id":539335756,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1629111734,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/539335756/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotone Increasing Digits","memory":"5.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int monotoneIncreasingDigits(int n) {\n        string s=to_string(n);\n        int x=s.length()-1,j=x;\n        while(j>0 && s[j-1]<=s[j])j--;\n        if(j<=0) return n;\n        while(j<=x)s[j++]='0';\n        n=stoi(s);\n        n-=1;\n        return monotoneIncreasingDigits(n);\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotone-increasing-digits"}
